question:
The Chishti Sufis in the Deccan were referred by which of the following names?
1) Ulema-i-akhirat
2) Ulema-i-duniya
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Chishti Sufis were referred to as the ulema-i-akhirat in northern India and as the ulema-i-duniya in the Deccan. The end of the fourteenth century saw a decline of the Chishti order in northern India.
